messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Keith is a former soldier and has lived in Exeter for 20 years running a successful business. He is chairman of the Exeter branch of UKIP. He has campaigned extensively among local residents and is convinced that UKIP best represents their values.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: He wants to leave the EU, scrap the European Arrest Warrant.
issues.economy: Fairer tax system: UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
issues.health: Invest in the NHS: UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS.
issues.immigration: Control our borders: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.

housing.content: UKIP will SCRAP the bedroom tax.

leaflet.personalStatement: With his passion, commitment and common sense, he will make a first class MP for Exeter.

politicalExperience.role: Chairman of the Exeter branch of UKIP

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Keith Crawford on behalf of Keith Crawford, Crusader Court, Higher Wheatley Farm, Pocombe Exeter, EX4 2HB. Printed by Media Print Group, Park Lane House, Park Lane, Oldbury B69 4JX.
